title: Italian couple are saved from landslide by their CATS who woke them up as house collapsed
text:
An Italian couple survived a landslide that caused their house to collapse after being woken by their cats, giving them time to escape, according to local media.

Sabrina Pellegrini and Claudio Piana went to bed as fierce rains across northern Italy on Monday night saw rivers burst their banks, washed away a bridge and sparked landslides.

'My wife got up because Simba and Mose, our cats, were making a noise and woke us up,' Mr Piana told the Secolo XIX newspaper.

'She realised they were playing with a piece of plaster which had just fallen off the ceiling. Then we saw cracks opening in the walls,' he said.

Sabrina Pellegrini and Claudio Piana (pictured together) survived a landslide that caused their house to collapse after being woken by their cats

Unbeknown to them, one such landslide had damaged the house's foundations, the newspaper said.

The couple rushed out to the car, but found themselves trapped by a sea of mud until they were eventually rescued by firefighters.

'My brother then called and said 'Claudio, your house has collapsed',' Mr Piana said.

The two-storey home in Campo Ligure was reduced to a pile of rubble by the landslide, according to local media.

'Now we have nothing. The firefighters said we can never go back into the house, it's too dangerous,' he added.

'At least Simba and Mose survived.'

The violent storms across northern Italy, killing a taxi driver and forcing dozens of people from their homes.
description: Sabrina Pellegrini and Claudio Piana (pictured together) went to bed during fierce rains in northern Italy which eventually caused their house to collapse.
